memberdef.argsstring: (FlavBit, MSSM_spectrum, NEW_CAPABILITY, relabelSpectrum, Spectrum,(MSSM30atQ, MSSM30atMGUT),(unimproved_MSSM_spectrum, Spectrum)) namespace Gambit
memberdef.name: QUICK_FUNCTION

inbodydescription.para: Make an unimproved GAMBIT spectrum object from an SLHA file
Relabel it as a complete spectrum
W decays only need the total width for SuperIso
Z decays only need the total width for SuperIso
